Item 5.02 - Departure of Directors or Ce.content: On January 14, 2025, JPMorgan Chase & Co. (“JPMorgan Chase” or the “Firm”) announced that Daniel Pinto, 62, President and Chief Operating Officer of the Firm, will retire at the end of 2026. Mr. Pinto will relinquish his responsibilities as President and Chief Operating Officer as of June 30, 2025. Jennifer A. Piepszak, 54, Co-Chief Executive Officer of the Commercial & Investment Bank, has been named as a Chief Operating Officer of the Firm, effective immediately. A copy of the press release relating to this announcement is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1.

subsections.Retirement of Daniel Pinto: On January 14, 2025, JPMorgan Chase & Co. (“JPMorgan Chase” or the “Firm”) announced that Daniel Pinto, 62, President and Chief Operating Officer of the Firm, will retire at the end of 2026. Mr. Pinto will relinquish his responsibilities as President and Chief Operating Officer as of June 30, 2025.
subsections.Appointment of Jennifer A. Piepszak: Jennifer A. Piepszak, 54, Co-Chief Executive Officer of the Commercial & Investment Bank, has been named as a Chief Operating Officer of the Firm, effective immediately.
subsections.Related Exhibit: A copy of the press release relating to this announcement is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1.
